The family, the tenant, the wedding, the businessman, the neighbors, the poor child and the run over. 7 black comedy stories of a dysfunctional society." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt7416602/","name":"7 raons per fugir","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjM2OTI2N2ItZGM3Yi00ZTJmLWI5M2UtMDUxYjU0NWIwNDhiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTA0MjU0Ng@@._V1_.jpg","description":"The family, the tenant, the wedding, the businessman, the neighbors, the poor child and the run over. 7 black comedy stories of a dysfunctional society.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt7416602/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"JvH48"},"dateCreated":"2021-05-02","inLanguage":"English","name":"7 Short stories assembled into 75-minutes feature, each hilarious and unpredictable. Filmcrew and actors are common. Nothing else binds stories together","reviewBody":"Saw this at the Brussel International Fantastic Film Festival 2019 (BIFFF for intimates). 7 Hilarious stories, some 10 minutes each, told one after another. In other words, we see 7 shorts assembled into one feature length movie. Writers, directors and actors are more or less common to the 7 stories, and the whole footage is shot in a handful of weeks, at a moment when all involved actors were available full time. (info from the Q&A after the screening).\n\nEach of the stories gives us something to ponder about, either by turning things around in an unusual but interesting way, or to include some social commentary in an unexpected way. Lots of good ideas are included. I am not sure there is a morale, or one or more packaged messages as takeaways. I saw no final wrapup to tie all story lines together, so I stay with my statement about 7 shorts shown after another.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":523,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.5},"genre":["Comedy"],"datePublished":"2019-04-05","keywords":"black comedy,black humor,surrealism,anthology film,social commentary","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Tráiler [OV]","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3595811353","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDIwNmQ5MTQtYzhiOC00MzdiLWI5ODItNGJhMjg5YmI2NGEzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDIwNmQ5MTQtYzhiOC00MzdiLWI5ODItNGJhMjg5YmI2NGEzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":""},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0649649/","name":"Francesc Orella"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1748319/","name":"Rosa Cadafalch"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2205196/","name":"Pol López"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4313632/","name":"Gerard Quinto"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2706147/","name":"Esteve Soler"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4314663/","name":"David Torras"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0660858/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0456857/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0573845/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2706147/","name":"Esteve Soler"}],"duration":"PT1H15M"}</script><metacontent="

With Robert Olech, Piotr Glowacki, Cezary Lukaszewicz, Martyna Peszko." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0479261/","name":"Rozdroze Cafe","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZGJjYTU2NWQtZmUzNy00YTA5LWE3NWMtZDUzNzhiYTIyMGQ1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTc4MzI2NQ@@._V1_.jpg","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0479261/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"temporarybobi"},"dateCreated":"2005-11-15","inLanguage":"English","name":"Well done","reviewBody":"I saw this film in Krakow's Kino Pod Baranami. Film was well done. It depicts the misunderstandings among some young polish provincial people, who have the ambitions to crop up in the new post-communist, re-capitalist society.

While the young women in the film are trying to escape the disconsolately life by either getting know established oldsters or by giving birth to numerous children, the young men decide to rob a bank. Things get wrong, one of the guys flips out and kills four people.

The film is supposed to be based on a true story which has happened for about 3-4 years in Warsaw. The screenplay makes use of many clichés, otherwise film is well done."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":142,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.2},"genre":["Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2005-11-11","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2027064/","name":"Robert Olech"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1644158/","name":"Piotr Glowacki"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2021835/","name":"Cezary Lukaszewicz"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0941829/","name":"Leszek Wosiewicz"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0049230/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0941829/","name":"Leszek Wosiewicz"}],"duration":"PT1H52M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.desc: Najśmieszniejsze fragmenty z programów polskich stacji TV: gafy popełniane przez prezenterów, ich nietypowe zachowania przed kamerą oraz awarie techniczne powodujące absurdalne sytuacje.

programme.title: Hollywood Buzz
programme.desc: W programie nowości kinowe, relacje z planów zdjęciowych oraz ciekawostki związanych z gwiazdami srebrnego ekranu. O pracy nad najnowszymi hollywoodzkimi produkcjami opowiadają ich twórcy - znani reżyserzy i aktorzy. Autorzy magazynu przedstawiają również zwiastuny filmów wchodzących na ekrany kin.

programme.title: Jasminum
Jasminum
programme.desc: Jasminum: Directed by Jan Jakub Kolski. With Justyna Bartoszewicz, Grazyna Blecka-Kolska, Marta Dabrowska, Grzegorz Damiecki. The peaceful world of a monastery, in a small town Jasmine, is destroyed by the arrival of monument restorers, Natasha, along with her daughter Eugenia. The legend associated with the monastery bode revelation in him a saint in the near future. Despite initial reluctance, Natasha starts the maintenance of the image stored there. The secrets of the monastery are unraveled: the unhappy lovers bodies placed in the catacombs, the secret elixir of love, created with the smell of the monks." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0778749/","name":"Jasminum","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDkyNzM5ZmQtYTFmNi00ZGI3LWI2MjctNzYwMDAwOWM1ZTYyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTc4MzI2NQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"The peaceful world of a monastery, in a small town Jasmine, is destroyed by the arrival of monument restorers, Natasha, along with her daughter Eugenia. programme.title: Hitchcock
Hitchcock
programme.desc:
Hitchcock: Directed by Sacha Gervasi. With Anthony Hopkins, Helen Mirren, Scarlett Johansson, Danny Huston. The relationship between Alfred Hitchcock and his wife Alma Reville during the filming of Psycho (1960) in 1959 is explored." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0975645/","name":"Hitchcock","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODAwNDI5NjIwN15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNjc4ODc2OA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"The relationship between Alfred Hitchcock and his wife Alma Reville during the filming of Psycho (1960) in 1959 is explored.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0975645/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"ChooseyAMovie"},"dateCreated":"2013-02-08","inLanguage":"English","name":"Keep the Hitch, drop the Cock.","reviewBody":"Hitchcock follows Alfred Hitchcock's strenuous quest to complete a picture to which everyone deemed awful. Also incorporated into the storyline is the love story of Alfred and his wife. And the strain the picture was putting on it.

I had high hopes for Hitchcock. Alfred Hitchcock may not be my favorite director but he was most defiantly light years ahead of his time and undeniably a genius. On top of that Psycho is one of my favorite films ever made. So far this film was shaping up to be fantastic, it appealed to me in all the right ways, trailer was good, Anthony Hopkins as Hitchcock and it was about the making of Psycho. To which, aspiring filmmakers as well as the average movie goer can really appreciate. So why only a 7/10?

Well, the film delved too deeply into the love story, I personally think. The film is very enjoyable and to that aspect of the film, I don't mind as much as you may perceive but withholding that aspect and indulging on the actual making of Psycho could have really benefited this film. It's not the film Hitchcock or Psycho fans will love, it will be a film where you walk out and remark, "that was good," but not a very solid good. And normally I would be inclined to agree with you, but for some reason I still did like this film.

It contains fantastic acting including Hopkins, albeit certain scenes he may have overacted a tad bit, it's interesting and is enjoyable. In addition it also contains great references albeit not very subtle, the complete opposite of subtle to Psycho and a few other Hitchcock films which work to its advantage in my opinion. I also rather liked the inclusion of Ed Gein and the conversations that took place between him and Hitchcock.

Basically this film will appeal to everyone. But, unfortunately it isn't the film it could have been or should have been, but ultimately it is enjoyable, funny and above all entertaining. If you're a fan of Hitchcock and Psycho though, don't get your hopes up too high.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":73947,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.8},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Biography","Drama","Romance"],"datePublished":"2012-12-14","keywords":"year 1959,1950s,los angeles california,studio executive,censorship board","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"No. 1","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2501551129","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTU1MTgzODM1NF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwODEzOTk1OA@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTU1MTgzODM1NF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwODEzOTk1OA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A love story between influential filmmaker Alfred Hitchcock and wife Alma Reville during the filming of Psycho in 1959."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000164/","name":"Anthony Hopkins"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000545/","name":"Helen Mirren"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0424060/","name":"Scarlett Johansson"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0315065/","name":"Sacha Gervasi"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0028932/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0199880/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0118469/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0572352/","name":"John J. programme.review: --- Actors: Anthony Hopkins (role=Alfred Hitchcock), Helen Mirren (role=Alma Reville), Scarlett Johansson (role=Janet Leigh), Danny Huston (role=Whitfield Cook), Toni Collette (role=Peggy), Michael Stuhlbarg (role=Lew Wasserman), Michael Wincott (role=Ed Gein), Jessica Biel (role=Vera Miles), James D'Arcy (role=Anthony Perkins), Richard Portnow (role=Barney Balaban), Kurtwood Smith (role=Geoffrey Shurlock), Ralph Macchio (role=Joseph Stefano)

IMDb data; ttnr: 0975645, Title: Hitchcock, --- Description: Hitchcock: Directed by Sacha Gervasi. With Anthony Hopkins, Helen Mirren, Scarlett Johansson, Danny Huston. The relationship between Alfred Hitchcock and his wife Alma Reville during the filming of Psycho (1960) in 1959 is explored." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0975645/","name":"Hitchcock","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODAwNDI5NjIwN15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNjc4ODc2OA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"The relationship between Alfred Hitchcock and his wife Alma Reville during the filming of Psycho (1960) in 1959 is explored.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0975645/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"ChooseyAMovie","dateCreated":"2013-02-08","inLanguage":"English","name":"Keep the Hitch, drop the Cock.","reviewBody":"Hitchcock follows Alfred Hitchcock's strenuous quest to complete a picture to which everyone deemed awful. Also incorporated into the storyline is the love story of Alfred and his wife. And the strain the picture was putting on it.

I had high hopes for Hitchcock. Alfred Hitchcock may not be my favorite director but he was most defiantly light years ahead of his time and undeniably a genius. On top of that Psycho is one of my favorite films ever made. So far this film was shaping up to be fantastic, it appealed to me in all the right ways, trailer was good, Anthony Hopkins as Hitchcock and it was about the making of Psycho. To which, aspiring filmmakers as well as the average movie goer can really appreciate. So why only a 7/10?

Well, the film delved too deeply into the love story, I personally think. The film is very enjoyable and to that aspect of the film, I don't mind as much as you may perceive but withholding that aspect and indulging on the actual making of Psycho could have really benefited this film. It's not the film Hitchcock or Psycho fans will love, it will be a film where you walk out and remark, "that was good," but not a very solid good. And normally I would be inclined to agree with you, but for some reason I still did like this film.

It contains fantastic acting including Hopkins, albeit certain scenes he may have overacted a tad bit, it's interesting and is enjoyable. In addition it also contains great references albeit not very subtle, the complete opposite of subtle to Psycho and a few other Hitchcock films which work to its advantage in my opinion. I also rather liked the inclusion of Ed Gein and the conversations that took place between him and Hitchcock.

Basically this film will appeal to everyone. But, unfortunately it isn't the film it could have been or should have been, but ultimately it is enjoyable, funny and above all entertaining. If you're a fan of Hitchcock and Psycho though, don't get your hopes up too high.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":73947,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.8,"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Biography","Drama","Romance"],"datePublished":"2012-12-14","keywords":"year 1959,1950s,los angeles california,studio executive,censorship board","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"No. 1","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2501551129","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTU1MTgzODM1NF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwODEzOTk1OA@@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTU1MTgzODM1NF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwODEzOTk1OA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A love story between influential filmmaker Alfred Hitchcock and wife Alma Reville during the filming of Psycho in 1959.","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000164/","name":"Anthony Hopkins","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000545/","name":"Helen Mirren","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0424060/","name":"Scarlett Johansson"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0315065/","name":"Sacha Gervasi"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0028932/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0199880/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0118469/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0572352/","name":"John J. programme.title: Fourmi
Mój mały mistrz
Fourmi
programme.desc:
Fourmi: Directed by Julien Rappeneau. With François Damiens, Maleaume Paquin, André Dussollier, Ludivine Sagnier. Théo would like to give some hope to his father, Laurent, a lonely alcoholic and disillusioned with life. The opportunity comes when Théo is about to be signed by Arsenal FC." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt9767556/","name":"Fourmi","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTY0MjFiM2EtNmIxMy00NjIwLWFiNjctOTAxODBkMTNlZDllXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyODIyOTEyMzY@._V1_.jpg","description":"Théo would like to give some hope to his father, Laurent, a lonely alcoholic and disillusioned with life. The opportunity comes when Théo is about to be signed by Arsenal FC.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt9767556/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"ulicknormanowen"},"dateCreated":"2020-12-19","inLanguage":"English","name":"A lie can save a human wreck.","reviewBody":"François Damiens is the stand out ,in his portrayal of a man,Laurent , who has lost everything ,even the custody of his only child, a teenage whiz kid ;considering the limitations he's working under,he's to be commended : the divorced man ,whose wife started a new life with a well-respected man who tries to win the boy's affection,a brat who has only eyes for his dad who of course sank into alcoholism ,it is a cliché to end all the clichés.

Laurent is really a poor pitiful man whose son's gift for football is his only reason to cling to life ;he's even become persona non grata on the football field,and,supreme vexation, he's denied to attend his boy's last game. Although he was not selected by the Arsenal FC recruiter ,Theo makes his father believe he is actually about to sign to the prestigious club.

Overnight ,helped by a devoted social worker , the overwrought man changes : he will find a job, he will learn English with a walkman and cassettes ( is it still used ?says the social worker), and ,last but not least ,he will quit drinking (a few relapses will happen). "Fourmi " (=ant;the football wizard is too short to be signed to Arsenal )is the story of a redemption.Theo knows that ,if he does not qualify for the selection,his father's life is irreparably doomed ;so he's compelled to lie to his coach (André Dussolier) and his assistant (who seems to prefer pastry cook to football,so do I).

Only his good friend,Karim is in secret ;as for the youngsters ' performances ,it's uneven :it goes from good (Laurent,Karim) to mediocre (Max ,the computer wizzard :how could you believe this giddy jerk would be able to write an email using the perfect club jargon,? the young actor acts as if he does not care)

The subject of the movie is a man's redemption ;it renders the denouement null and void ,a crowd-pleaser ,the expected event ; the movie would have been a hundred times more convincing without it , and reductio ad aburdum that a lie can be vital to save a human life .And that a man can help himself ,and ,after a while does not need his son's prowesses to be a human being again ( the bedroom he paints for him speaks volumes about his metamorphosis).And Mr Damiens was up to scratch!","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":298,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.1},"genre":["Comedy","Drama"],"datePublished":"2019-09-04","keywords":"alcoholic,competition,boy,fraud,father son relationship","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Trailer [English The Darkest Minds
programme.desc: The Darkest Minds: Directed by Jennifer Yuh Nelson. With Amandla Stenberg, Mandy Moore, Bradley Whitford, Harris Dickinson. Imprisoned by an adult world that now fears everyone under 18, a group of teens form a resistance group to fight back and reclaim control of their future." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt4073790/","name":"The Darkest Minds","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTUxOGE3OTUtM2I2My00YzE3LTg2NDktZTI3NjE4NDdjMGFiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTMxODk2OTU@._V1_.jpg","description":"Imprisoned by an adult world that now fears everyone under 18, a group of teens form a resistance group to fight back and reclaim control of their future.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt4073790/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"jordenanimelove"},"dateCreated":"2018-08-03","inLanguage":"English","name":"Fantastic!","reviewBody":"I love the characters so much and the acting was fantastic. Even though it was fast paced and seemed slightly rushed at times, it kept you on the edge of your seat. The young kids stole the show and I was impressed it's their acting. \n\nFind out if you like the movie for yourself and don't listen to all the negative reviews. programme.title: The Glorias
Gloria Steinem. Moje życie w drodze
The Glorias
programme.desc:
The Glorias: Directed by Julie Taymor. With Julianne Moore, Alicia Vikander, Ryan Kiera Armstrong, Lulu Wilson. The story of feminist icon Gloria Steinem's itinerant childhood and its influence on her life as a writer, activist and organizer for women's rights worldwide." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt7435316/","name":"The Glorias","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZmE1ZDI3MTgtODNmZi00OTQyLTkyYjMtNzI3OTRhOWEwY2NjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyODc0OTEyNDU@._V1_.jpg","description":"The story of feminist icon Gloria Steinem's itinerant childhood and its influence on her life as a writer, activist and organizer for women's rights worldwide.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt7435316/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"SnobReviews"},"dateCreated":"2020-10-13","inLanguage":"English","name":"Expected much more.","reviewBody":"Unfocused but well acted; "The Glorias" pays homage to a feminist icon with a talented cast but the final product is far from being iconic.

In this drama, feminist icon Gloria Steinem recounts her itinerant childhood's influence on her life as a writer, activist and organizer for women's rights worldwide. Based on a true story.

I can appreciate director Julie Taymor's vision (except for that "Wizard Of Oz" sequence, which was a bit much), but "The Glorias" leans more on the messy side rather than being wholly empowering. However the cast is great; Julianne Moore is terrific, Alicia Vikander delivers a solid performance, but Bette Midler is the scene stealer and kicks serious ass in her role. An inspiring and interesting story but overly long and uneven.

Follow @snobmedia for more reviews!","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":5}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":2785,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.6},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Biography","Drama","History"],"datePublished":"2020-09-30","keywords":"feminism,activism,journalism,based on book,based on true story","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi162185497","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDNiZTdkOTMtNTk5Mi00OWNhLWEwMjgtNDljNmU5OTM5ZWU0XkEyXkFqcGdeQWpnYW1i._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDNiZTdkOTMtNTk5Mi00OWNhLWEwMjgtNDljNmU5OTM5ZWU0XkEyXkFqcGdeQWpnYW1i._V1_.jpg","description":"Journalist, fighter, and feminist Gloria Steinem is an indelible icon known for her world-shaping activism, guidance of the revolutionary women's movement, and writing that has impacted generations. In this nontraditional biopic, Julie Taymor crafts a complex tapestry of one of the most inspirational and legendary figures of modern history, based on Steinem's own memoir My Life on the Road."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000194/","name":"Julianne Moore"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2539953/","name":"Alicia Vikander"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1847117/","name":"Janelle Monáe"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0853380/","name":"Julie Taymor"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0436784/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0706288/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0718129/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0853380/","name":"Julie Taymor"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3951729/","name":"Sarah Ruhl"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0825887/","name":"Gloria Steinem"}],"duration":"PT2H27M"}</script><metacontent="

An artist is suspected of selling a valuable painting to the Nazis, but there is more to the story than meets the eye." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt8337320/","name":"The Last Vermeer","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMWE1NzcyOGYtMmY4Zi00NTA3LWE0OGQtM2RlNGI4Y2JlZTAyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMDA4NzMyOA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"An artist is suspected of selling a valuable painting to the Nazis, but there is more to the story than meets the eye.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt8337320/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"celt007"},"dateCreated":"2021-02-24","inLanguage":"English","name":"Pearce is fantastic","reviewBody":"Interesting and intriguing story of post ww2 society in Holland .

Great acting but Pearce and others . Directed and beautifully filmed .

If you like historical dramas I would recommend this movie .","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":2272,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.7},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Drama"],"datePublished":"2020-11-20","keywords":"one word title,world war two,nazi,painter,art","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3152527641","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNmVmNWY0OGUtOGE4ZS00OWZkLTllNGItMDk3YmI4Zjg1MTc4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNmVmNWY0OGUtOGE4ZS00OWZkLTllNGItMDk3YmI4Zjg1MTc4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"While Joseph Piller (Bang), a Dutch Jew, was fighting in the Resistance during the Second World War, the witty, debonair aesthete, Han van Meegeren (Pearce) was hosting hedonistic soirées and selling Dutch art treasures to Hermann Goring and other top Nazis. Following the war, Piller becomes an investigator assigned the task of identifying and redistributing stolen art, resulting in the flamboyant van Meegeren being accused of collaboration - a crime punishable by death. But, despite mounting evidence, Piller, with the aid of his assistant (Krieps), becomes increasingly convinced of Han's innocence and finds himself in the unlikely position of fighting to save his life."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001602/","name":"Guy Pearce"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0051903/","name":"Claes Bang"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3043279/","name":"Vicky Krieps"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm6679051/","name":"Dan Friedkin"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0473978/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0241129/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0650089/","name":"John Orloff"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1318843/","name":"Mark Fergus"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1319757/","name":"Hawk Ostby"}],"duration":"PT1H58M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: 25 lat niewinnosci. Sprawa Tomka Komendy
25 lat niewinności. Sprawa Tomka Komendy
programme.desc:
25 lat niewinnosci. Sprawa Tomka Komendy: Directed by Jan Holoubek. With Piotr Trojan, Agata Kulesza, Dariusz Chojnacki, Jan Frycz. The ordinary life of Tomasz Komenda is turned upside down when he is wrongly accused of brutal murder and sentenced to 25 years in prison." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt11368998/","name":"25 lat niewinnosci. Sprawa Tomka Komendy","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BM2E3YWNhMTgtMzRiZS00N2UxLWJkYzEtOGYyMWFhNDhlZmExXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTEwMTY3NDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"The ordinary life of Tomasz Komenda is turned upside down when he is wrongly accused of brutal murder and sentenced to 25 years in prison.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt11368998/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"v-26640"},"dateCreated":"2021-01-20","inLanguage":"English","name":"A powerful movie about how person can be sentenced on circumstantial evidences.","reviewBody":"Tomasz Komenda was sentenced about 3 years after the crime had been committed basing on simple idea - 'find me a man and we fill forge evidences against him'. What this move does not show is that at that time Attorney General, now deceased Lech Kaczynski had been urged that a killer is found and sentenced to silence medias hysteria and coverage about brutal murder and rape of that young girl. Later when the murder was put on Tomasz, he was publicly defamed by Lech Kaczynski. Despite Mr L. Kaczynski death in Smolensk plane crash and after Tomasz was exonerated, no polish public institution nor police have never apologized Tomasz for their actions, which is a standard practice in western democratic countries.

Not much changed in post-soviet bloc however after 1990 in terms of judiciary mentality. Human Rights Watch estimates that 1-3% of sentences in Poland may be those in which innocent people are sentenced just because either suspects were threatened by police to force to confess by beatings. No effective police control and their procedures exists as of today. You may call it a mafia or not but I believe it's not far from truth in Poland.

Personally I believe his family did not do enough to get him out of prison, a good lawyer would smash the case easily and he is worth every money, why did it happen 15 years later is a mystery for me.

As Tomasz said after his release, there are no good people in prisons , there is only evil.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":829,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.5},"genre":["Drama"],"datePublished":"2020-09-18","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3825975/","name":"Piotr Trojan"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0474492/","name":"Agata Kulesza"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2621963/","name":"Dariusz Chojnacki"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1450132/","name":"Jan Holoubek"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0015575/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0185099/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1733303/","name":"Andrzej Golda"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1450132/","name":"Jan Holoubek"}],"duration":"PT1H56M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Time Freak
Zakochany geniusz
Time Freak
programme.desc:
Time Freak: Directed by Andrew Bowler. With Asa Butterfield, Sophie Turner, Skyler Gisondo, Will Peltz. A genius teenage boy is in love with a girl who breaks up after a year. He invents a time-machine and tries to fix the break-up repeatedly. He finally goes a year back with his friend/advisor to fix the bad days." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt6769280/","name":"Time Freak","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzhmMzI5MDItODg2My00M2IxLTgxMGItNTZkYWIxNWVkMDNhXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyOTg4MDYyNw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A genius teenage boy is in love with a girl who breaks up after a year. He invents a time-machine and tries to fix the break-up repeatedly. He finally goes a year back with his friend/advisor to fix the bad days.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt6769280/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"thekarmicnomad"},"dateCreated":"2018-11-12","inLanguage":"English","name":"More heart than mind - not much Sci-Fi to see here.","reviewBody":"A boy-genius meets the love of his life. A few months later they have split up - cue the time machine to get her back.

At first glance I knew I had definitely been here before - but I was wrong.

On the surface you can enjoy this as a very simple, quaint romance with the odd joke thrown in.

The sci-fi element of this is kept on the down low. There are no annoying sequences about paradoxes, dichotomies or accidentally shagging your own parents here. This is all about the relationships of the three main characters and the choices we make in life.

Straight away the leads do not look like they are an actual couple and I assumed their chemistry would be garbage.

This, however, is one of the strengths of the film and what sets it apart.

This will really resonate with anyone who (like me) has gone out with someone who is clearly hotter and more vivacious than themselves. There was something painfully familiar seeing the lead character snowballing trivial disagreements in to major issues due to a lack-of-confidence, fear and jealousy. Then of course the harder he tries to fix things the more damage he causes.

The characters are great in this; they are so believable they almost feel like people from my actual past. The story is simple but non-judgmental - I found myself rooting for all parties involved all the time.

Despite having some depth this remains a nice light watch, there is no nudity, violence, political agendas, and it won't stretch your brains or emotions too far either.

An excellent watch!","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":8128,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.8},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Comedy","Drama","Romance"],"datePublished":"2018-11-07","keywords":"based on short film,time travel,young love,coming of age,teenage boy","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3467622937","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNWI3NzU4NDQtM2RkZC00ZGY1LWJhOTgtNThmZjBkZGM2NWY4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNWI3NzU4NDQtM2RkZC00ZGY1LWJhOTgtNThmZjBkZGM2NWY4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Physics prodigy Stillman (Butterfield) is destined for great things, only to be derailed when his girlfriend, Debbie (Turner) suddenly dumps him. But Stillman isn't beaten, he does what any heartbroken genius would do - he invents a time machine to get a second chance at love."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2633535/","name":"Asa Butterfield"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3849842/","name":"Sophie Turner"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1711114/","name":"Skyler Gisondo"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1577772/","name":"Andrew Bowler"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0555595/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0564574/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0636796/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1577772/","name":"Andrew Bowler"}],"duration":"PT1H44M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Ma famille et le loup
Chłopiec i wilk
Ma famille et le loup
programme.desc:
Ma famille et le loup: Directed by Adrià García. With Carmen Maura, Pierre Rochefort, Bruno Salomone, Franc Bruneau. 9 years old Hugo spends the summer holidays with his cousins and his grandma Sara. When they learn that the wolf is coming to pick her up, the children are mobilizing to save their grandmother and embark on an unforgettable adventure." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt5869404/","name":"Ma famille et le loup","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODYwNmVlNTctM2MxYS00MWUyLTg0ZTYtYTg2NDIzMWU0YmNkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMjA1MDczNjc@._V1_.jpg","description":"9 years old Hugo spends the summer holidays with his cousins and his grandma Sara. When they learn that the wolf is coming to pick her up, the children are mobilizing to save their grandmother and embark on an unforgettable adventure","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt5869404/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"ulicknormanowen"},"dateCreated":"2020-09-11","inLanguage":"English","name":"The wolf always wins.","reviewBody":"In the children's imaginative world there are the goodies (Santa Claus, the Tooth Fairy) and the baddies ( the Wolf ,the Bogey Man) .The Wolf wins in Charles Perrault' s "the Little Red riding Hood" ,even though the tale was often sweetened when told to children (the hunter's intervention).

Grandma met the Wolf when she was young (a little red riding hood ), but she was saved by the man who would become her husband (the equivalent of the hunter).But this summer ,he comes to take her back,now that she is about to celebrate her eightieth birthday.

Her grandchilden are not prepared to accept it ; instead of bickering ,they will spend their holidays looking for a way to prevent grandma from being "wolfed" .But the old lady had already told Hugo -it was the first time he had met her ,for his dad is a workaholic,often on his mobile - there was no sense in trying for she made a deal when she was young,and now her time has come.In the show they stage , granny appears in the finale -after some ponderous acts- just to say goodbye to all her family to urge them to carry on:we survive through our children and our life is eternal.

The movie adds computer animation for the imaginary scenes; the last ones ,in which the wolf intervenes with real characters,a la "Mary Poppins" , are the most successful.

By and large, nevertheless, acting and directing are not equal to the subject :with the exception of the deeply moving Carmen Maura , the actors overplay : the male cast ,particularly , tries to hog the stage and they are almost unbearable ;besides ,in the bakery , they got an incredible nerve ,not exactly an useful example for the young audience ;poetry which was present in Jean-Claude Brialy 's "Eglantine" (1971) on a similar subject is nowhere to be found.

That said, even though the results are not always satisfying , it was a good way to deal with a harsh subject :the ineluctable .The younger audience will certainly need explanations from their parents after viewing it.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":86,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.8},"genre":["Comedy","Family","Fantasy"],"datePublished":"2019-08-21","keywords":"children","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Bande-annonce [OV]","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2453519385","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BY2ZiZWJhZTAtNThjMS00NWRhLWEzNDMtNDFkYTJlNDdjZWZmXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BY2ZiZWJhZTAtNThjMS00NWRhLWEzNDMtNDFkYTJlNDdjZWZmXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":""},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0560962/","name":"Carmen Maura"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0734004/","name":"Pierre Rochefort"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0758912/","name":"Bruno Salomone"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2348224/","name":"Adrià García"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0596308/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0698042/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0384091/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm5526293/","name":"Valérie Magis"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1166131/","name":"Stéphane Malandrin"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1159646/","name":"Víctor Maldonado"}],"duration":"PT1H20M"}</script><metacontent="

Twists, turns and surprises will have you guessing till the end!!","reviewBody":"This was quite a well done movie. These days most movies you know where theyre going long before they get there. I thought I had this one pegged thru out but it kept coming up with surprises. These days they dumb down a lot of movies so everyone in the audience gets the story but that tends to let you guess the end long before you get there. Im happy to say not this one. Everytime you think its going to be this type of movie it turns into another type and that continues until the surprising ending which the film gives nothing away about until the last couple of minutes. Great acting great cinematography. Definitely worth a watch through. programme.title: Love, Weddings & Other Disasters
Miłość, ślub i inne nieszczęścia
Love, Weddings & Other Disasters
programme.desc:
Love, Weddings & Other Disasters: Directed by Dennis Dugan. With Maggie Grace, Diane Keaton, Jeremy Irons, Dennis Dugan. It is a multi-story romantic comedy about the people who work on weddings to create the perfect day for a loving couple - while their own relationships are outlandish, odd, crazy and far from perfect." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt10235718/","name":"Love, Weddings & Other Disasters","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODA5NzRjMDktMzc0My00NDdkLThlN2YtNDZiYjM3MGVkY2M4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTEyMjM2NDc2._V1_.jpg","description":"It is a multi-story romantic comedy about the people who work on weddings to create the perfect day for a loving couple - while their own relationships are outlandish, odd, crazy and far from perfect.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt10235718/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"ts-0000"},"dateCreated":"2021-06-07","inLanguage":"English","name":"Why the hate?","reviewBody":"Was it perfect? Lol-Not at all.

However did have overall parts,that made it watchable.

Casting was decent,most of the storylines & cinematography too."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":1451,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Comedy","Romance"],"datePublished":"2020-12-04","keywords":"couple","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi4041982233","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjFjNTQxNGEtMjEzNS00ZjI1LTg1OTYtOTRlNmI0NzNkY2YwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjFjNTQxNGEtMjEzNS00ZjI1LTg1OTYtOTRlNmI0NzNkY2YwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Maggie Grace (Taken) and Oscar® winners Diane Keaton and Jeremy Irons lead this warmhearted romantic comedy. With a couple’s impending wedding as the backdrop, Love, Weddings & Other Disasters weaves multiple storylines as it follows the search for love by a colorful group of characters including: an inexperienced wedding planner (Grace) nicknamed “The Wedding Trasher”; a fussy celebrity caterer (Irons); his blind date (Keaton); and a tour-bus guide (Andrew Bachelor) looking for his Cinderella. How their lives and loves intersect is half the fun in this film that proves romance is alive and well… and as crazy as ever!"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1192254/","name":"Maggie Grace"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000473/","name":"Diane Keaton"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000460/","name":"Jeremy Irons"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0240797/","name":"Dennis Dugan"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0754311/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0447556/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0810439/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0174885/","name":"Eileen Conn"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0240797/","name":"Dennis Dugan"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0588777/","name":"Larry Miller"}],"duration":"PT1H36M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: The Tax Collector
The Tax Collector
programme.desc: The Tax Collector: Directed by David Ayer. With Bobby Soto, Cinthya Carmona, Shia LaBeouf, Jose Conejo Martin. A "tax collector" working for a local crime lord finds his family's safety compromised when the rival of his boss shows up in L.A. and upends the business." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt8461224/","name":"The Tax Collector","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMmFmZTdhYmItNjIyZS00ZjVlLWFjZjgtMjMyMDA5ZmVjNzE0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMDM2NDM2MQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A "tax collector" working for a local crime lord finds his family's safety compromised when the rival of his boss shows up in L.A. and upends the business.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt8461224/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"danielcereto"},"dateCreated":"2020-08-08","inLanguage":"English","name":"Are you serious?","reviewBody":"This movie has potential but everything goes to heck because of the extremely bad script. Nine Months
programme.desc: Nine Months: Directed by Chris Columbus. With Hugh Grant, Julianne Moore, Tom Arnold, Joan Cusack. When he finds out his longtime girlfriend is pregnant, a commitment-phobe realizes he might have to change his lifestyle for better or much, much worse." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0113986/","name":"Nine Months","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BY2U3YTQzYWYtZTBlYi00ZmJjLTkzMjAtOTljYmE5MThhNzk5L2ltYWdlL2ltYWdlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTQxNzMzNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"When he finds out his longtime girlfriend is pregnant, a commitment-phobe realizes he might have to change his lifestyle for better or much, much worse.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0113986/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"venom_701"},"dateCreated":"2003-08-06","inLanguage":"English","name":"Argument For Sterilization","reviewBody":""Nine Months" is a predictable chick flick, where a very happy, content bachelor knocks up his live-in girlfriend, thereby turning his world upside-down. Lessons learned: men who don't want to marry and have children are portrayed as immature, self-absorbed, selfish, and misguided. Carting lots of screaming kids around in a minivan is, apparently, the most fun a man can have in this lifetime. For women, having children is the ultimate achievement and fulfillment of their lives. This is an insulting fairy tale that women will love, because it shows men who don't want marriage and kids as BAD and men who do want marriage and kids as GOOD. Women are always GOOD no matter what their attitude or actions are."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":36120,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.5},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Comedy","Romance"],"datePublished":"1995-07-12","keywords":"time for title,bad dream,close up of eyes,close up of lips,close up of mouth","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Nine Months","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2812084505","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjljYWMxZTUtNTQxYy00Yjc2LWI3MDEtYTNiYTQzMDZiMzE2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjljYWMxZTUtNTQxYy00Yjc2LWI3MDEtYTNiYTQzMDZiMzE2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Theatrical Trailer from 20th Century Fox"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000424/","name":"Hugh Grant"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000194/","name":"Julianne Moore"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000792/","name":"Tom Arnold"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001060/","name":"Chris Columbus"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0000756/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0046151/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0105317/","name":"Patrick Braoudé"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001060/","name":"Chris Columbus"}],"duration":"PT1H43M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: I Still Believe
Wierzę w Ciebie
I Still Believe
programme.desc: I Still Believe: Directed by Andrew Erwin, Jon Erwin. With K.J. Apa, Britt Robertson, Nathan Parsons, Gary Sinise. The true-life story of Christian music star Jeremy Camp and his journey of love and loss that looks to prove there is always hope." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt9779516/","name":"I Still Believe","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZTczOTM1ZGEtNzkyNS00NGRmLWI3YjEtZmRlOGZmMzgzNzU2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMjMxOTE0ODA@._V1_.jpg","description":"The true-life story of Christian music star Jeremy Camp and his journey of love and loss that looks to prove there is always hope.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt9779516/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"kelstra"},"dateCreated":"2020-04-05","inLanguage":"English","name":"A Real Tear Jerker","reviewBody":"I am a huge fan of Britt Robertson - mainly as a result of her performance in Mr Church. In spite of my regard for her however, I was a little reluctant to see this movie, due to its association as a religious movie. In the end my regard for Britt won over and I took the plunge. I need not have been concerned as the religious content was very subtle and was perfectly within the context of the story. This is easily Britt Robertson's best performance to date and the way she interacted with K.J.Apa was remarkable. You could really feel the bond between them which by all accounts was genuine and it showed in the excellent performances from both of them. This is a very moving film and anyone who doesn't shed a tear of two could only be made of stone. Beautifully shot and directed and interlaced with some really nice music. Definitely one of the better movies of recent times and highly recommended. My seven star rating might seem a little low in view of my approval but I am a harsh judge and my rating is very much in line with IMdB's. I guess everyone is aware that the movie is based on actual events. I have no idea how accurately it depicts them but it would seem that it hasn't strayed too far from the truth.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":10204,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.5},"contentRating":"PG","genre":["Biography","Drama","Music"],"datePublished":"2020-03-13","keywords":"liver cancer,singer songwriter,faith in god,love,religious film","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi615563033","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZWFiOGE5NWYtNTcxOC00ODZjLWFiZWQtMGQ3ZTFkNzk4OTAyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZWFiOGE5NWYtNTcxOC00ODZjLWFiZWQtMGQ3ZTFkNzk4OTAyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"The true life story of Christian music mega-star Jeremy Camp and his journey of love and loss."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm6216001/","name":"K.J. Apa"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1429380/","name":"Britt Robertson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1452155/","name":"Nathan Parsons"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3401779/","name":"Andrew Erwin"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2296528/","name":"Jon Erwin"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0409926/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0802102/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1705229/","name":"Jeremy Camp"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2296528/","name":"Jon Erwin"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0348197/","name":"Jon Gunn"}],"duration":"PT1H56M"}</script><metacontent="

Apa (role=Jeremy), Britt Robertson (role=Melissa), Nathan Parsons (role=Jean-Luc), Gary Sinise (role=Tom), Shania Twain (role=Teri), Reuben Dodd (role=Josh), Nicolas Bechtel (role=Jared), Melissa Roxburgh (role=Heather), Terry Serpico (role=Mark), Tanya Christiansen (role=Jannette), Cameron Arnett (role=Doctor Furst), Abigail Cowen (role=Adrienne)

IMDb data; ttnr: 9779516, Title: I Still Believe, --- Description: I Still Believe: Directed by Andrew Erwin, Jon Erwin. With K.J. Apa, Britt Robertson, Nathan Parsons, Gary Sinise. The true-life story of Christian music star Jeremy Camp and his journey of love and loss that looks to prove there is always hope." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt9779516/","name":"I Still Believe","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZTczOTM1ZGEtNzkyNS00NGRmLWI3YjEtZmRlOGZmMzgzNzU2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMjMxOTE0ODA@._V1_.jpg","description":"The true-life story of Christian music star Jeremy Camp and his journey of love and loss that looks to prove there is always hope.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt9779516/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"kelstra","dateCreated":"2020-04-05","inLanguage":"English","name":"A Real Tear Jerker","reviewBody":"I am a huge fan of Britt Robertson - mainly as a result of her performance in Mr Church. In spite of my regard for her however, I was a little reluctant to see this movie, due to its association as a religious movie. In the end my regard for Britt won over and I took the plunge. I need not have been concerned as the religious content was very subtle and was perfectly within the context of the story. This is easily Britt Robertson's best performance to date and the way she interacted with K.J.Apa was remarkable. You could really feel the bond between them which by all accounts was genuine and it showed in the excellent performances from both of them. This is a very moving film and anyone who doesn't shed a tear of two could only be made of stone. Beautifully shot and directed and interlaced with some really nice music. Definitely one of the better movies of recent times and highly recommended. My seven star rating might seem a little low in view of my approval but I am a harsh judge and my rating is very much in line with IMdB's. I guess everyone is aware that the movie is based on actual events. programme.title: Jasminum
Jasminum
programme.desc: Jasminum: Directed by Jan Jakub Kolski. With Justyna Bartoszewicz, Grazyna Blecka-Kolska, Marta Dabrowska, Grzegorz Damiecki. The peaceful world of a monastery, in a small town Jasmine, is destroyed by the arrival of monument restorers, Natasha, along with her daughter Eugenia. The legend associated with the monastery bode revelation in him a saint in the near future. Despite initial reluctance, Natasha starts the maintenance of the image stored there. The secrets of the monastery are unraveled: the unhappy lovers bodies placed in the catacombs, the secret elixir of love, created with the smell of the monks." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0778749/","name":"Jasminum","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDkyNzM5ZmQtYTFmNi00ZGI3LWI2MjctNzYwMDAwOWM1ZTYyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTc4MzI2NQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"The peaceful world of a monastery, in a small town Jasmine, is destroyed by the arrival of monument restorers, Natasha, along with her daughter Eugenia. The legend associated with the monastery bode revelation in him a saint in the n","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0778749/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"voron-5"},"dateCreated":"2006-12-28","inLanguage":"English","name":"Excellent!","reviewBody":"Well....to be honest I am a huge fan of Masters Gayos and Peczka so their participation was the main force that made me to get JASMINUM and my God! the movie is AMAZING! From the beginning to the end...I was embraced by a cascade of colors, sounds and scents...yes - SCENTS for as one of previous reviewers said - You can literally FEEL the scent of the mysterious fragrances! I'd compare my impressions to those I got after watching "Amelie Poulain". Sound - amazing Picture - incredible Actors - superb! Without a doubt I can predict a bright future to Polish cinematography if there would be more that one of a kind (IMO - so far) movie I am talking about! \n\nIf you are looking for something different, if you are tired to the all like Hollywood "matrix" movies - JASMINUM is the very right answer!","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":1273,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7},"genre":["Comedy","Romance"],"datePublished":"2006-05-05","keywords":"voice over narration,woman beater,sex,scent,runaway groom","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2702136/","name":"Justyna Bartoszewicz"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0088111/","name":"Grazyna Blecka-Kolska"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0196449/","name":"Marta Dabrowska"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0464383/","name":"Jan Jakub Kolski"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0004670/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0464383/","name":"Jan Jakub Kolski"}],"duration":"PT1H55M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Zloto dezerterów
Złoto dezerterów
programme.desc:
Zloto dezerterów: Directed by Janusz Majewski. With Marek Kondrat, Boguslaw Linda, Wiktor Zborowski, Katarzyna Figura. During World War II a group of safe-crackers sets off on a mission to steal gold from a Nazi bank." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0191666/","name":"Zloto dezerterów","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYzM4OTI4ZGUtNmQyZS00NjZiLWE4OWUtNDA3Y2RkOGE4ZTkzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTc4MzI2NQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"During World War II a group of safe-crackers sets off on a mission to steal gold from a Nazi bank.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0191666/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Maziun"},"dateCreated":"2013-08-07","inLanguage":"English","name":"Bad sequel to fun movie","reviewBody":"This is a sequel to movie from 1985 – HK Deserters" . The heroes from the first movie also appear here , but there is plenty of new heroes . The first movie was a war comedy about a group of friends running away from army . This one is supposed to be a war comedy about stealing gold from Nazi's.

It was supposed to be comedy . Unfortunately the movie takes itself way too seriously . The movie unnecessary tries to tell something about anti-Semitism , betrayal and courage of freedom fighters. For more than half of the movie is hard to tell that this is comedy . When the so-called jokes appear in the second half of the movie they so awful you will groan. The movie also feels too long (it's 2 hours long ) , which wasn't a problem in the first movie (which was almost 3 hours long) . Gone is the charm and the fun of original.

The acting is good and the music is very jolly . Still , it's too little to save the movie from being a disaster. I give it 1/10. Better watch "Kelly's heroes". Or the original – "HK Deserters".","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":1}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":487,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5},"genre":["Action","Comedy","War"],"datePublished":"1998-12-04","keywords":"1940s,world war two","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0464945/","name":"Marek Kondrat"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0511277/","name":"Boguslaw Linda"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0953975/","name":"Wiktor Zborowski"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0538105/","name":"Janusz Majewski"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0538105/","name":"Janusz Majewski"}],"duration":"PT2H3M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: THE LEGENDS z Tomkiem Ćwiąkałą
programme.desc: Cykl wywiadów przeprowadzanych przez Tomka Ćwiąkałę z ważnymi postaciami ze świata futbolu. Wśród nich są mistrzowie świata, Europy i gwiazdy topowych lig. Widzowie dowiedzą się, czym zajmują się dzisiaj, jak wspominają swoje kariery oraz poznają ich plany na przyszłość.

programme.title: Zielona rewolucja Marty Dymek
programme.desc: Popularna blogerka Marta Dymek w każdym odcinku próbuje przekonać zaproszonego gościa do kuchni wegetariańskiej. Prowadząca pokaże, jak zastąpić potrawy mięsne ich jarskimi wariacjami.

programme.title: Ugotuj mi, mamo! 2
programme.desc: Iwona Zasuwa, autorka bloga Smakoterapia, zaskakuje pomysłowością dań dla dzieci. Gotuje w towarzystwie mam i ich pociech. Oprócz ciekawych pomysłów na potrawy przygotowywane z myślą o najmłodszych, gospodyni programu podzieli się także wieloma praktycznymi radami na temat tego co, jak i kiedy serwować swoim milusińskim. Ponadto eksperci wytłumaczą, dlaczego pewne produkty szkodzą, a inne mają zbawienny wpływ na zdrowie zarówno dzieci, jak i rodziców.

programme.title: David w Europie 3
programme.desc: David Gaboriaud wyrusza w kulinarną podróż po Europie. Odwiedza m.in. Kopenhagę, Wilno i Tallinn. Gotuje potrawy, inspirując się lokalnymi składnikami, i przybliża charakterystykę miejscowej kuchni.

programme.title: David w Europie 3
programme.desc: David Gaboriaud wyrusza w kulinarną podróż po Europie. Odwiedza m.in. Kopenhagę, Wilno i Tallinn. Gotuje potrawy, inspirując się lokalnymi składnikami, i przybliża charakterystykę miejscowej kuchni.

programme.title: Rośliny Karoliny
programme.desc: Karolina Kudłacik, miłośniczka roślinności i specjalistka w dziedzinie projektowania ogrodów, udowadnia, że w każdej przestrzeni można stworzyć coś wyjątkowego. Prowadząca uwielbia rzeczy używane.

programme.title: Rośliny Karoliny
programme.desc: Karolina Kudłacik, miłośniczka roślinności i specjalistka w dziedzinie projektowania ogrodów, udowadnia, że w każdej przestrzeni można stworzyć coś wyjątkowego. Prowadząca uwielbia rzeczy używane.

programme.title: Pogotowie remontowe Wieśka 2
programme.desc: Dla wielu ludzi już sama wizja remontu jest niezwykle stresująca. Obawy okazują się uzasadnione, gdy pracownicy niesprawdzonych firm remontowych wyrządzają niewybaczalne szkody. Drugi sezon programu, w którym ceniony specjalista budowlany, Wiesław Skiba, naprawi błędy popełnione przez niekompetentnych kolegów po fachu oraz podpowie widzom, jak samodzielnie uporać się z drobnymi usterkami.

programme.title: Remont w 48h 12
programme.desc: Tomasz Pągowski odwiedza ludzi, którzy chcieliby zrobić remont mieszkania. Udowadnia, że metamorfozę można przeprowadzić szybko i tanio.

credits.actor: Maciej Orłowski

programme.title: Tenis: Turniej WTA w Portoroż
programme.desc: Salisbury, 2018 rok. Agent MI6 Siergiej Skripal oraz jego córka zostają otruci niezidentyfikowaną substancją toksyczną. Okazuje się, że użyto rosyjskiej broni chemicznej. Życie mieszkańców jest zagrożone. Służby starają się uchronić społeczność przed zabójczym nowiczokiem. Miniserial inspirowany prawdziwą historią.

programme.title: TkaniNOWE kreacje
programme.desc: Program prowadzony przez projektanta wnętrz i miłośnika nietuzinkowych rozwiązań, Artura Indykę. Specjalista podpowiada, jak dokonać szybkiej metamorfozy przestrzeni i odmienić oblicze sypialni, salonu czy pokoju dziecięcego. Pokaże widzom, jak wykorzystać do tego tkaniny dekoracyjne, użytkowe czy ozdobne, w tym również zasłony, dywany oraz wiele innych nieoczywistych materiałów.

programme.title: We Bought a Zoo
Kupiliśmy zoo
We Bought a Zoo
programme.desc:
We Bought a Zoo: Directed by Cameron Crowe. With Matt Damon, Scarlett Johansson, Thomas Haden Church, Colin Ford. Set in Southern California, a father moves his young family to the countryside to renovate and re-open a struggling zoo." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1389137/","name":"We Bought a Zoo","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQ0MTE3OTUwMl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwODg5NjgwNw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Set in Southern California, a father moves his young family to the countryside to renovate and re-open a struggling zoo.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1389137/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"wbhendrix-1"},"dateCreated":"2011-11-27","inLanguage":"English","name":"Beautiful & Touching, Crowe does it again.","reviewBody":"Cameron Crowe never fails to deliver hart warming drama-comedies that make you laugh, cry and keep you on the edge of your seat for duration of his films. For me personally, I never seem to agree with Crowe's casting taste (Matt Damon and Scarlett Johansson never do much for me) but Cameron has a way with actors and a true vision for his story. He always seems to know exactly who can capture his characters and ultimately draw out your emotions that he's tugging at. 

In We Bought a Zoo, there is a bit of a slow start and at one point I was worried Cameron had lowered his voice to appeal to a larger audience to please producers and critics alike (after his Critically-bombed but personal all time fav, Elizabethtown). 

But let me tell you, pay your dues with the first half of this film because the second half will take you on a mesmerizing cinematic adventure you'll be heartbroken for more. Cameron ventures into a new family drama without compromising his voice, music taste or quality film making. And if you are still not a huge CC fan, the animals are sure to win you over. Their beautiful and natural moments on screen are as breath taking as they are tear-jerking.

Spend an amazing two hours with this film and there won't be a person in your household that won't agree that this film is one to remember. From a fan and living-room-critic, I give it two thumbs up :)","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":138994,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.1},"contentRating":"PG","genre":["Comedy","Drama","Family"],"datePublished":"2011-12-23","keywords":"based on true story,zoo,inspection,tween girl,2010s","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Trailer #1","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi592747545","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTM2NzI1NDc2Nl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNTgwMDg2Ng@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTM2NzI1NDc2Nl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNTgwMDg2Ng@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A father moves his young family to the countryside to renovate and re-open a struggling zoo. He always seems to know exactly who can capture his characters and ultimately draw out your emotions that he's tugging at. 

In We Bought a Zoo, there is a bit of a slow start and at one point I was worried Cameron had lowered his voice to appeal to a larger audience to please producers and critics alike (after his Critically-bombed but personal all time fav, Elizabethtown).

programme.title: Tenis: Turniej WTA w Cleveland - mecz półfinałowy gry pojedynczej: Sara Sorribes Tormo - Anett Kontaveit
programme.desc: Polska ukazana z niezwykłej perspektywy - z lotu ptaka. Tym razem twórcy starają się przede wszystkim uchwycić na swoich zdjęciach najróżniejsze królewskie zamki obronne, magnackie pałace oraz szlacheckie dwory i dworki. Oprócz samych fotografii zostanie przedstawiona także porywająca historia losów właścicieli tych lokacji. Widzowie zobaczą także wnętrza opisywanych twierdz i dworów.

programme.desc: The Longest Ride: Directed by George Tillman Jr.. With Britt Robertson, Scott Eastwood, Alan Alda, Jack Huston. The lives of a young couple intertwine with a much older man, as he reflects back on a past love." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt2726560/","name":"The Longest Ride","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzIzMjg0NjQwNF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwODAwOTE4MzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"The lives of a young couple intertwine with a much older man, as he reflects back on a past love.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2726560/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"patsworld"},"dateCreated":"2015-05-14","inLanguage":"English","name":"So, There's Yet Another Eastwood Heartthrob!","reviewBody":"And I don't think it's going to take any time at all for this hunk to be completely and absolutely known only for his own looks, talent, and fame rather than having the fact that he's Clint Eastwood's son being tacked on. Scott is good! Britt Robertson was nicely cast as Sophia, except I have to admit here that I kept seeing a young Renee Zellweger in the part– before the silly plastic surgery turned her into a total stranger. Or just strange. Whatever. Jack Huston was excellent as a young Ira and I think portraying the elderly Ira is one of Alan Alda's best roles. I was just expecting the usual chick flick - but not so. Rugged enough action with the bull riding to interest any guy, as well as a decent plot and all around good acting. programme.title: Predators
Predators
programme.desc:
Predators: Directed by Nimród Antal. With Adrien Brody, Topher Grace, Alice Braga, Walton Goggins. A group of elite warriors parachute into an unfamiliar jungle and are hunted by members of a merciless alien race." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1424381/","name":"Predators","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjFmNDNlMGItMDQxMS00ZWMxLTg4MmQtMTBiNWU3ZDU1Nzk1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTQxNzMzNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"A group of elite warriors parachute into an unfamiliar jungle and are hunted by members of a merciless alien race.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1424381/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"jzappa"},"dateCreated":"2011-10-24","inLanguage":"English","name":"Predator vs. Predator","reviewBody":"Predators, an entertaining film with genuine surprises, may be the first movie I've seen to start with a deus ex machina. Yes, the whole plot and all the humans plummet into the movie from the heavens, dropping toward the alien soil, shrieking, groping for ripcords on the parachutes that they didn't realize they had. The last thing they recall is a blinding blaze of light. The first to land, with a powerful thud, is Royce. The others then crash all around him.

These people are bitter specialized murderers from all over: a mercenary, a yakuza (who uses a Hanzo sword; probably QT buddy Rodriguez's idea), an Israeli markswoman, a serial killer, an African warlord, etc. How did they find themselves in this dense jungle, and why? They determine they're on another planet: a flawlessly terra-formed one, it would appear. The gravity lets them walk as usual, and they can breathe and hydrate. Royce observes something bizarre: The sun never moves. They see there are three or four moons in the sky, which are either colossal or very near.

Even more bizarre, it never becomes molten lava yanked around by enormous tidal waves. But as you always have to say when Rodriguez is involved, "Whatever." After the characters are assaulted by massive eponymous monsters, Royce nails it: They're in a game reservation. He solves a lot of questions in the movie, which might've been more interesting if he hadn't. But it's all still much more intriguing that just pitting two franchise monsters against each other. Instead, this movie is smart enough to again pit predators against humans, who are predators with the weakness of being human. It's the sense of compassion or empathy for our fellow human that makes us vulnerable to predators.

But who oversees this game preserve, and why? If you remember the first Predator, Schwarzenegger and other mercs were in the Amazon pitted against an invisible predatory extraterrestrial. Has that alien race snatched humans into its galaxy for a rematch? Is it a sensible consumption of assets to transfer numerous people countless light years merely so you can kill them purposelessly? No time to ponder. Here come some extremely ferocious four-legged creatures whose horns and fangs continue too far in front of their mouths for them to be able to eat their prey. They don't even look like they can lie on their backs and scoop the quarry in with their feet owing to all the spikes on their backs.

This is a Rodriguez production: Making sense is not an issue. The movie is generally about our malevolent protagonists being mauled by frightening mandible-jawed creatures. who use active camouflage and energy weapons, reposition as swiftly as panthers, can see in a variety of spectrums, and are equally as self-aware as humans, sans compassion of course. Nimrod Antal gave Vacancy a masterful sense of what to show and when to reveal it, and so is a proficient enough director to keep these villains intriguing throughout unintelligible jumbles of bullet-paced visual effects. The eponymous indigents see all in infrared POV shots via what seems like a closed-circuit monitor. Or sinister videotape on a motel TV set perhaps? There are invariably a handful of characters who get slaughtered in manhunt films like this. What puzzles me is why they all don't get slaughtered? Consider if that spiky warthog tackled you to the ground at 20 mph and all you could do was stick it with your knife, would you imagine you'd be making facetious comments on it later on? Still, a charming moment where Apocalypse Now alum Laurence Fishburne hums Ride of the Valkyrie nonetheless pulls us out of the claustrophobia by being meta-referential. On the other hand, lines like "Say goodbye to your little friend" work as momentary relief from the claustrophobia.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":217856,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.4},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Adventure","Sci-Fi"],"datePublished":"2010-07-09","keywords":"jungle,parachute,alien,planet,warrior","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Predators: Trailer #1","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2220360729","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTc5OTUyNDY1MF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDc1MzMzMzE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTc5OTUyNDY1MF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDc1MzMzMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"A group of elite warriors are hunted by members of a merciless alien race known as Predators."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004778/","name":"Adrien Brody"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000401/","name":"Laurence Fishburne"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0333410/","name":"Topher Grace"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0030735/","name":"Nimród Antal"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0000756/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0035848/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0022730/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0514821/","name":"Alex Litvak"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3360218/","name":"Michael Finch"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0859029/","name":"Jim Thomas"}],"duration":"PT1H47M"}</script><metacontent="
