programme.title: Enterprise
Enterprise
Star Trek: Enterprise
Enterprise
programme.desc: Enterprise: Created by Rick Berman, Brannon Braga. With Scott Bakula, John Billingsley, Jolene Blalock, Dominic Keating. A century before Captain Kirk's five-year mission, Jonathan Archer captains the United Earth ship Enterprise during the early years of Starfleet, leading up to the Earth-Romulan War and the formation of the Federation." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0244365/","name":"Enterprise","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODg3ZmFmMzAtMTY0Yi00ZDdmLTk1MWMtOThjNjJjODlhMzkwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTE1NjY5Mg@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A century before Captain Kirk's five-year mission, Jonathan Archer captains the United Earth ship Enterprise during the early years of Starfleet, leading up to the Earth-Romulan War and the formation of the Federation.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0244365/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"LtTroy"},"dateCreated":"2005-05-03","inLanguage":"English","name":"A Mixed Series","reviewBody":"I have mixed feelings about this show. It probably has contained some of the best and definitely a lot of the worst Trek episodes ever. It was meant to re-invent Trek but all it did was re-use old plot devices. The best thing they ever did was replace Berman, because he had been working on the franchise too long. Trek needs new blood, and for the 4th season they finally got it. But of course it came too late and now the show has been cancelled after it just started to find its footing.\n\nContrary to some other comments I've seen, Enterprise did NOT use its cast to its fullest potential. Mayweather has been virtually ignored since the first and second seasons (he wasn't even in most of the 3rd season episodes) and when he has been around lately it has only been to lift heavy things or hit something. Reed was just starting to get some good stuff this season. Enterprise had a wonderful opportunity to connect every Trek series together and revitalize the franchise but all it did (and most people believe this) was bury it. Despite Enterprise's accomplishments, its failures reign supreme. As much as I love Trek, it needs a rest. Maybe after a few years it will be brought back by people who have new ideas to bring to it. Then, hopefully, we will truly go where no one has gone before."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":48722,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.5},"contentRating":"TV-PG","genre":["Action","Adventure","Drama"],"datePublished":"2001-09-26","keywords":"earth starship,earthling,terran,space explorer,earthman","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000836/","name":"Scott Bakula"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0082517/","name":"John Billingsley"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0086883/","name":"Jolene Blalock"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0094909/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0066107/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0053559/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0075834/","name":"Rick Berman"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0103804/","name":"Brannon Braga"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Season 1 Blu-Ray Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2275393049","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNmViNzkzNjUtNDNhNS00Mzc0LWJhM2EtZmQ5MGI3NjE1MjFjXkEyXkFqcGdeQUlNRGJWaWRlb1RodW1ibmFpbFNlcnZpY2U@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNmViNzkzNjUtNDNhNS00Mzc0LWJhM2EtZmQ5MGI3NjE1MjFjXkEyXkFqcGdeQUlNRGJWaWRlb1RodW1ibmFpbFNlcnZpY2U@._V1_.jpg","description":""}}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Enterprise
Enterprise
Star Trek: Enterprise
Enterprise
programme.desc: Enterprise: Created by Rick Berman, Brannon Braga. With Scott Bakula, John Billingsley, Jolene Blalock, Dominic Keating. A century before Captain Kirk's five-year mission, Jonathan Archer captains the United Earth ship Enterprise during the early years of Starfleet, leading up to the Earth-Romulan War and the formation of the Federation." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0244365/","name":"Enterprise","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODg3ZmFmMzAtMTY0Yi00ZDdmLTk1MWMtOThjNjJjODlhMzkwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTE1NjY5Mg@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A century before Captain Kirk's five-year mission, Jonathan Archer captains the United Earth ship Enterprise during the early years of Starfleet, leading up to the Earth-Romulan War and the formation of the Federation.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0244365/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"LtTroy"},"dateCreated":"2005-05-03","inLanguage":"English","name":"A Mixed Series","reviewBody":"I have mixed feelings about this show. It probably has contained some of the best and definitely a lot of the worst Trek episodes ever. It was meant to re-invent Trek but all it did was re-use old plot devices. The best thing they ever did was replace Berman, because he had been working on the franchise too long. Trek needs new blood, and for the 4th season they finally got it. But of course it came too late and now the show has been cancelled after it just started to find its footing.\n\nContrary to some other comments I've seen, Enterprise did NOT use its cast to its fullest potential. Mayweather has been virtually ignored since the first and second seasons (he wasn't even in most of the 3rd season episodes) and when he has been around lately it has only been to lift heavy things or hit something. Reed was just starting to get some good stuff this season. Enterprise had a wonderful opportunity to connect every Trek series together and revitalize the franchise but all it did (and most people believe this) was bury it. Despite Enterprise's accomplishments, its failures reign supreme. As much as I love Trek, it needs a rest. Maybe after a few years it will be brought back by people who have new ideas to bring to it. Then, hopefully, we will truly go where no one has gone before."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":48722,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.5},"contentRating":"TV-PG","genre":["Action","Adventure","Drama"],"datePublished":"2001-09-26","keywords":"earth starship,earthling,terran,space explorer,earthman","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000836/","name":"Scott Bakula"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0082517/","name":"John Billingsley"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0086883/","name":"Jolene Blalock"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0094909/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0066107/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0053559/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0075834/","name":"Rick Berman"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0103804/","name":"Brannon Braga"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Season 1 Blu-Ray Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2275393049","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNmViNzkzNjUtNDNhNS00Mzc0LWJhM2EtZmQ5MGI3NjE1MjFjXkEyXkFqcGdeQUlNRGJWaWRlb1RodW1ibmFpbFNlcnZpY2U@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNmViNzkzNjUtNDNhNS00Mzc0LWJhM2EtZmQ5MGI3NjE1MjFjXkEyXkFqcGdeQUlNRGJWaWRlb1RodW1ibmFpbFNlcnZpY2U@._V1_.jpg","description":""}}</script><metacontent="

IMDb data; ttnr: 0244365, Title: Enterprise, --- Description: Enterprise: Created by Rick Berman, Brannon Braga. With Scott Bakula, John Billingsley, Jolene Blalock, Dominic Keating. A century before Captain Kirk's five-year mission, Jonathan Archer captains the United Earth ship Enterprise during the early years of Starfleet, leading up to the Earth-Romulan War and the formation of the Federation." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0244365/","name":"Enterprise","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODg3ZmFmMzAtMTY0Yi00ZDdmLTk1MWMtOThjNjJjODlhMzkwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTE1NjY5Mg@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A century before Captain Kirk's five-year mission, Jonathan Archer captains the United Earth ship Enterprise during the early years of Starfleet, leading up to the Earth-Romulan War and the formation of the Federation.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0244365/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"LtTroy","dateCreated":"2005-05-03","inLanguage":"English","name":"A Mixed Series","reviewBody":"I have mixed feelings about this show. It probably has contained some of the best and definitely a lot of the worst Trek episodes ever. It was meant to re-invent Trek but all it did was re-use old plot devices. The best thing they ever did was replace Berman, because he had been working on the franchise too long. Trek needs new blood, and for the 4th season they finally got it. But of course it came too late and now the show has been cancelled after it just started to find its footing.\n\nContrary to some other comments I've seen, Enterprise did NOT use its cast to its fullest potential. Mayweather has been virtually ignored since the first and second seasons (he wasn't even in most of the 3rd season episodes) and when he has been around lately it has only been to lift heavy things or hit something. Reed was just starting to get some good stuff this season. Enterprise had a wonderful opportunity to connect every Trek series together and revitalize the franchise but all it did (and most people believe this) was bury it. Despite Enterprise's accomplishments, its failures reign supreme. As much as I love Trek, it needs a rest. Maybe after a few years it will be brought back by people who have new ideas to bring to it. Then, hopefully, we will truly go where no one has gone before.","aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":48722,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.5,"contentRating":"TV-PG","genre":["Action","Adventure","Drama"],"datePublished":"2001-09-26","keywords":"earth starship,earthling,terran,space explorer,earthman","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000836/","name":"Scott Bakula","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0082517/","name":"John Billingsley","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0086883/","name":"Jolene Blalock"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0094909/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0066107/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0053559/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0075834/","name":"Rick Berman","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0103804/","name":"Brannon Braga"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Season 1 Blu-Ray Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2275393049","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNmViNzkzNjUtNDNhNS00Mzc0LWJhM2EtZmQ5MGI3NjE1MjFjXkEyXkFqcGdeQUlNRGJWaWRlb1RodW1ibmFpbFNlcnZpY2U@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNmViNzkzNjUtNDNhNS00Mzc0LWJhM2EtZmQ5MGI3NjE1MjFjXkEyXkFqcGdeQUlNRGJWaWRlb1RodW1ibmFpbFNlcnZpY2U@._V1_.jpg","description":""</script><metacontent="

programme.desc: Enterprise: Created by Rick Berman, Brannon Braga. With Scott Bakula, John Billingsley, Jolene Blalock, Dominic Keating. A century before Captain Kirk's five-year mission, Jonathan Archer captains the United Earth ship Enterprise during the early years of Starfleet, leading up to the Earth-Romulan War and the formation of the Federation." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0244365/","name":"Enterprise","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODg3ZmFmMzAtMTY0Yi00ZDdmLTk1MWMtOThjNjJjODlhMzkwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTE1NjY5Mg@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A century before Captain Kirk's five-year mission, Jonathan Archer captains the United Earth ship Enterprise during the early years of Starfleet, leading up to the Earth-Romulan War and the formation of the Federation.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0244365/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"LtTroy"},"dateCreated":"2005-05-03","inLanguage":"English","name":"A Mixed Series","reviewBody":"I have mixed feelings about this show. It probably has contained some of the best and definitely a lot of the worst Trek episodes ever. It was meant to re-invent Trek but all it did was re-use old plot devices. The best thing they ever did was replace Berman, because he had been working on the franchise too long. Trek needs new blood, and for the 4th season they finally got it. But of course it came too late and now the show has been cancelled after it just started to find its footing.\n\nContrary to some other comments I've seen, Enterprise did NOT use its cast to its fullest potential. Mayweather has been virtually ignored since the first and second seasons (he wasn't even in most of the 3rd season episodes) and when he has been around lately it has only been to lift heavy things or hit something. Reed was just starting to get some good stuff this season. Enterprise had a wonderful opportunity to connect every Trek series together and revitalize the franchise but all it did (and most people believe this) was bury it. Despite Enterprise's accomplishments, its failures reign supreme. As much as I love Trek, it needs a rest. Maybe after a few years it will be brought back by people who have new ideas to bring to it. Then, hopefully, we will truly go where no one has gone before."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":48722,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.5},"contentRating":"TV-PG","genre":["Action","Adventure","Drama"],"datePublished":"2001-09-26","keywords":"earth starship,earthling,terran,space explorer,earthman","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000836/","name":"Scott Bakula"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0082517/","name":"John Billingsley"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0086883/","name":"Jolene Blalock"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0094909/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0066107/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0053559/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0075834/","name":"Rick Berman"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0103804/","name":"Brannon Braga"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Season 1 Blu-Ray Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2275393049","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNmViNzkzNjUtNDNhNS00Mzc0LWJhM2EtZmQ5MGI3NjE1MjFjXkEyXkFqcGdeQUlNRGJWaWRlb1RodW1ibmFpbFNlcnZpY2U@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNmViNzkzNjUtNDNhNS00Mzc0LWJhM2EtZmQ5MGI3NjE1MjFjXkEyXkFqcGdeQUlNRGJWaWRlb1RodW1ibmFpbFNlcnZpY2U@._V1_.jpg","description":""}}</script><metacontent="

A century before Captain Kirk's five-year mission, Jonathan Archer captains the United Earth ship Enterprise during the early years of Starfleet, leading up to the Earth-Romulan War and the formation of the Federation." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0244365/","name":"Enterprise","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODg3ZmFmMzAtMTY0Yi00ZDdmLTk1MWMtOThjNjJjODlhMzkwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTE1NjY5Mg@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A century before Captain Kirk's five-year mission, Jonathan Archer captains the United Earth ship Enterprise during the early years of Starfleet, leading up to the Earth-Romulan War and the formation of the Federation.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0244365/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"LtTroy"},"dateCreated":"2005-05-03","inLanguage":"English","name":"A Mixed Series","reviewBody":"I have mixed feelings about this show. It probably has contained some of the best and definitely a lot of the worst Trek episodes ever. It was meant to re-invent Trek but all it did was re-use old plot devices. The best thing they ever did was replace Berman, because he had been working on the franchise too long. Trek needs new blood, and for the 4th season they finally got it. But of course it came too late and now the show has been cancelled after it just started to find its footing.\n\nContrary to some other comments I've seen, Enterprise did NOT use its cast to its fullest potential. Mayweather has been virtually ignored since the first and second seasons (he wasn't even in most of the 3rd season episodes) and when he has been around lately it has only been to lift heavy things or hit something. Reed was just starting to get some good stuff this season. Enterprise had a wonderful opportunity to connect every Trek series together and revitalize the franchise but all it did (and most people believe this) was bury it. Despite Enterprise's accomplishments, its failures reign supreme. As much as I love Trek, it needs a rest. Maybe after a few years it will be brought back by people who have new ideas to bring to it. IMDb data; ttnr: 0244365, Title: Enterprise, --- Description: Enterprise: Created by Rick Berman, Brannon Braga. With Scott Bakula, John Billingsley, Jolene Blalock, Dominic Keating. A century before Captain Kirk's five-year mission, Jonathan Archer captains the United Earth ship Enterprise during the early years of Starfleet, leading up to the Earth-Romulan War and the formation of the Federation." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0244365/","name":"Enterprise","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODg3ZmFmMzAtMTY0Yi00ZDdmLTk1MWMtOThjNjJjODlhMzkwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTE1NjY5Mg@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A century before Captain Kirk's five-year mission, Jonathan Archer captains the United Earth ship Enterprise during the early years of Starfleet, leading up to the Earth-Romulan War and the formation of the Federation.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0244365/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"LtTroy","dateCreated":"2005-05-03","inLanguage":"English","name":"A Mixed Series","reviewBody":"I have mixed feelings about this show. It probably has contained some of the best and definitely a lot of the worst Trek episodes ever. It was meant to re-invent Trek but all it did was re-use old plot devices. The best thing they ever did was replace Berman, because he had been working on the franchise too long. Trek needs new blood, and for the 4th season they finally got it. But of course it came too late and now the show has been cancelled after it just started to find its footing.\n\nContrary to some other comments I've seen, Enterprise did NOT use its cast to its fullest potential. Mayweather has been virtually ignored since the first and second seasons (he wasn't even in most of the 3rd season episodes) and when he has been around lately it has only been to lift heavy things or hit something. Reed was just starting to get some good stuff this season. Enterprise had a wonderful opportunity to connect every Trek series together and revitalize the franchise but all it did (and most people believe this) was bury it. Despite Enterprise's accomplishments, its failures reign supreme. As much as I love Trek, it needs a rest. Maybe after a few years it will be brought back by people who have new ideas to bring to it. Then, hopefully, we will truly go where no one has gone before.","aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":48722,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.5,"contentRating":"TV-PG","genre":["Action","Adventure","Drama"],"datePublished":"2001-09-26","keywords":"earth starship,earthling,terran,space explorer,earthman","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000836/","name":"Scott Bakula","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0082517/","name":"John Billingsley","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0086883/","name":"Jolene Blalock"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0094909/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0066107/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0053559/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0075834/","name":"Rick Berman","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0103804/","name":"Brannon Braga"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Season 1 Blu-Ray Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2275393049","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNmViNzkzNjUtNDNhNS00Mzc0LWJhM2EtZmQ5MGI3NjE1MjFjXkEyXkFqcGdeQUlNRGJWaWRlb1RodW1ibmFpbFNlcnZpY2U@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNmViNzkzNjUtNDNhNS00Mzc0LWJhM2EtZmQ5MGI3NjE1MjFjXkEyXkFqcGdeQUlNRGJWaWRlb1RodW1ibmFpbFNlcnZpY2U@._V1_.jpg","description":""</script><metacontent="

programme.title: The Jurassic Games
Jurajskie igrzyska
The Jurassic Games
programme.desc:
The Jurassic Games: Directed by Ryan Bellgardt. With Ryan Merriman, Perrey Reeves, Adam Hampton, Katie Burgess. In the near future, 10 death row convicts are forced to compete in a virtual reality game that pits them against dinosaurs and each other." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt6710826/","name":"The Jurassic Games","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZWJkMzE4ZTAtOTY1ZS00YmZjLWI2MzQtZTg4MzdiN2U4NmUyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTUwMzY1MDM@._V1_.jpg","description":"In the near future, 10 death row convicts are forced to compete in a virtual reality game that pits them against dinosaurs and each other.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt6710826/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"TMLS313"},"dateCreated":"2018-08-27","inLanguage":"English","name":"Seen worse!","reviewBody":"Let's face it, B movies or parody movies are never going to challenge the best movies around. But every now and then one embraces the genre and just goes balls out. It's how the Sharknado movies became so popular - they run with the ridiculousness and it's entertaining in a brain-switched-off kind of way.

This is another of those. It's totally ludicrous, the acting is never knowingly at par and the writing is either signposted, basic or insane. But that fits the movie. There are so called studio movies that take themselves too seriously and fail to grasp the basic concept to entertain, or even to understand their own premise like the Purge movies.

It's short. That probably helps, as you don't tire of it. There are twists, pretty much all signposted but at least they're logical for the narrative. Even the effects are just on the right side of ropey. 

Watch it for what it is. If you can enjoy this sort of thing normally, you should do. If you don't just ignore it. It's not going to make your year but you might not pass some time as easily.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":2540,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":3.8},"contentRating":"Not Rated","genre":["Action","Horror","Sci-Fi"],"datePublished":"2019-06-27","keywords":"dinosaur,death,murder,violence,virtual world","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"The Jurassic Games","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1699067929","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjljZGQzZTgtMzY4Ni00YWVlLWFjMDQtYTc3NWM4ODk4ZGEwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjljZGQzZTgtMzY4Ni00YWVlLWFjMDQtYTc3NWM4ODk4ZGEwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Official Trailer"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0581365/","name":"Ryan Merriman"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0716275/","name":"Perrey Reeves"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1043935/","name":"Adam Hampton"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3155454/","name":"Ryan Bellgardt"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0592636/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3155454/","name":"Ryan Bellgardt"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3806686/","name":"Galen Christy"}],"duration":"PT1H26M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Legends of Tomorrow
Legends of Tomorrow
Legends of Tomorrow

Level 16
programme.desc:
Level 16: Directed by Danishka Esterhazy. With Katie Douglas, Celina Martin, Sara Canning, Peter Outerbridge. In a highly regimented boarding school, a pair of students discover that things are not as they seem." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt4006302/","name":"Level 16","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDY2MGU5ZDctYjQ3ZC00ODAyLTg1ZTMtOWZhMjE5MDQ5NDc1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMDk1Nzc2NQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"In a highly regimented boarding school, a pair of students discover that things are not as they seem.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt4006302/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"saccool"},"dateCreated":"2020-04-26","inLanguage":"English","name":"Not your typical Girls' School Horror","reviewBody":"If you're looking for cheap thrills and jump scares, this isn't the movie for you. If you are looking for a good horror that keeps you on the edge of your seat, makes your skin crawl, and keeps you asking questions till the very end then you're in the right place!!

People say it's a rehash of a common theme but it's made something new out of something overdone. There's no way to guess every twist and turn coming from these girls and their care takers.

If you like horror that makes you think and question every characters motive. This is the movie for you!!","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":8158,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.1},"contentRating":"Not Rated","genre":["Drama","Sci-Fi","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2019-05-27","keywords":"title directed by female,obedience,security guard,punishment,f rated","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3353780/","name":"Katie Douglas"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4955588/","name":"Celina Martin"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3048050/","name":"Sara Canning"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0261629/","name":"Danishka Esterhazy"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0128500/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0261629/","name":"Danishka Esterhazy"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1086155/","name":"Katharine Montagu"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0160942/","name":"Ken Chubb"}],"duration":"PT1H42M"}</script><metacontent="

In a highly regimented boarding school, a pair of students discover that things are not as they seem." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt4006302/","name":"Level 16","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDY2MGU5ZDctYjQ3ZC00ODAyLTg1ZTMtOWZhMjE5MDQ5NDc1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMDk1Nzc2NQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"In a highly regimented boarding school, a pair of students discover that things are not as they seem.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt4006302/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"saccool","dateCreated":"2020-04-26","inLanguage":"English","name":"Not your typical Girls' School Horror","reviewBody":"If you're looking for cheap thrills and jump scares, this isn't the movie for you. If you are looking for a good horror that keeps you on the edge of your seat, makes your skin crawl, and keeps you asking questions till the very end then you're in the right place!!

People say it's a rehash of a common theme but it's made something new out of something overdone. There's no way to guess every twist and turn coming from these girls and their care takers.

If you like horror that makes you think and question every characters motive. programme.title: The Jurassic Games
Jurajskie igrzyska
The Jurassic Games
programme.desc:
The Jurassic Games: Directed by Ryan Bellgardt. With Ryan Merriman, Perrey Reeves, Adam Hampton, Katie Burgess. In the near future, 10 death row convicts are forced to compete in a virtual reality game that pits them against dinosaurs and each other." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt6710826/","name":"The Jurassic Games","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZWJkMzE4ZTAtOTY1ZS00YmZjLWI2MzQtZTg4MzdiN2U4NmUyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTUwMzY1MDM@._V1_.jpg","description":"In the near future, 10 death row convicts are forced to compete in a virtual reality game that pits them against dinosaurs and each other.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt6710826/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"TMLS313"},"dateCreated":"2018-08-27","inLanguage":"English","name":"Seen worse!","reviewBody":"Let's face it, B movies or parody movies are never going to challenge the best movies around. But every now and then one embraces the genre and just goes balls out. It's how the Sharknado movies became so popular - they run with the ridiculousness and it's entertaining in a brain-switched-off kind of way.

This is another of those. It's totally ludicrous, the acting is never knowingly at par and the writing is either signposted, basic or insane. But that fits the movie. There are so called studio movies that take themselves too seriously and fail to grasp the basic concept to entertain, or even to understand their own premise like the Purge movies.

It's short. That probably helps, as you don't tire of it. There are twists, pretty much all signposted but at least they're logical for the narrative. Even the effects are just on the right side of ropey. 

Watch it for what it is. If you can enjoy this sort of thing normally, you should do. If you don't just ignore it. It's not going to make your year but you might not pass some time as easily.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":2540,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":3.8},"contentRating":"Not Rated","genre":["Action","Horror","Sci-Fi"],"datePublished":"2019-06-27","keywords":"dinosaur,death,murder,violence,virtual world","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"The Jurassic Games","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1699067929","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjljZGQzZTgtMzY4Ni00YWVlLWFjMDQtYTc3NWM4ODk4ZGEwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjljZGQzZTgtMzY4Ni00YWVlLWFjMDQtYTc3NWM4ODk4ZGEwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Official Trailer"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0581365/","name":"Ryan Merriman"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0716275/","name":"Perrey Reeves"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1043935/","name":"Adam Hampton"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3155454/","name":"Ryan Bellgardt"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0592636/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3155454/","name":"Ryan Bellgardt"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3806686/","name":"Galen Christy"}],"duration":"PT1H26M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Enterprise
Star Trek: Enterprise
Enterprise
programme.desc: Enterprise: Created by Rick Berman, Brannon Braga. With Scott Bakula, John Billingsley, Jolene Blalock, Dominic Keating. A century before Captain Kirk's five-year mission, Jonathan Archer captains the United Earth ship Enterprise during the early years of Starfleet, leading up to the Earth-Romulan War and the formation of the Federation." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0244365/","name":"Enterprise","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODg3ZmFmMzAtMTY0Yi00ZDdmLTk1MWMtOThjNjJjODlhMzkwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTE1NjY5Mg@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A century before Captain Kirk's five-year mission, Jonathan Archer captains the United Earth ship Enterprise during the early years of Starfleet, leading up to the Earth-Romulan War and the formation of the Federation.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0244365/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"LtTroy"},"dateCreated":"2005-05-03","inLanguage":"English","name":"A Mixed Series","reviewBody":"I have mixed feelings about this show. It probably has contained some of the best and definitely a lot of the worst Trek episodes ever. It was meant to re-invent Trek but all it did was re-use old plot devices. The best thing they ever did was replace Berman, because he had been working on the franchise too long. Trek needs new blood, and for the 4th season they finally got it. But of course it came too late and now the show has been cancelled after it just started to find its footing.\n\nContrary to some other comments I've seen, Enterprise did NOT use its cast to its fullest potential. Mayweather has been virtually ignored since the first and second seasons (he wasn't even in most of the 3rd season episodes) and when he has been around lately it has only been to lift heavy things or hit something. Reed was just starting to get some good stuff this season. Enterprise had a wonderful opportunity to connect every Trek series together and revitalize the franchise but all it did (and most people believe this) was bury it. Despite Enterprise's accomplishments, its failures reign supreme. As much as I love Trek, it needs a rest. Maybe after a few years it will be brought back by people who have new ideas to bring to it. Then, hopefully, we will truly go where no one has gone before."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":48722,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.5},"contentRating":"TV-PG","genre":["Action","Adventure","Drama"],"datePublished":"2001-09-26","keywords":"earth starship,earthling,terran,space explorer,earthman","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000836/","name":"Scott Bakula"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0082517/","name":"John Billingsley"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0086883/","name":"Jolene Blalock"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0094909/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0066107/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0053559/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0075834/","name":"Rick Berman"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0103804/","name":"Brannon Braga"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Season 1 Blu-Ray Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2275393049","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNmViNzkzNjUtNDNhNS00Mzc0LWJhM2EtZmQ5MGI3NjE1MjFjXkEyXkFqcGdeQUlNRGJWaWRlb1RodW1ibmFpbFNlcnZpY2U@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNmViNzkzNjUtNDNhNS00Mzc0LWJhM2EtZmQ5MGI3NjE1MjFjXkEyXkFqcGdeQUlNRGJWaWRlb1RodW1ibmFpbFNlcnZpY2U@._V1_.jpg","description":""}}</script><metacontent="

It probably has contained some of the best and definitely a lot of the worst Trek episodes ever. It was meant to re-invent Trek but all it did was re-use old plot devices. The best thing they ever did was replace Berman, because he had been working on the franchise too long. Trek needs new blood, and for the 4th season they finally got it. But of course it came too late and now the show has been cancelled after it just started to find its footing.\n\nContrary to some other comments I've seen, Enterprise did NOT use its cast to its fullest potential. Reed was just starting to get some good stuff this season. Enterprise had a wonderful opportunity to connect every Trek series together and revitalize the franchise but all it did (and most people believe this) was bury it. Despite Enterprise's accomplishments, its failures reign supreme. As much as I love Trek, it needs a rest. Maybe after a few years it will be brought back by people who have new ideas to bring to it. Then, hopefully, we will truly go where no one has gone before.","aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":48722,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.5,"contentRating":"TV-PG","genre":["Action","Adventure","Drama"],"datePublished":"2001-09-26","keywords":"earth starship,earthling,terran,space explorer,earthman","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000836/","name":"Scott Bakula","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0082517/","name":"John Billingsley","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0086883/","name":"Jolene Blalock"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0094909/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0066107/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0053559/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0075834/","name":"Rick Berman","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0103804/","name":"Brannon Braga"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Season 1 Blu-Ray Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2275393049","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNmViNzkzNjUtNDNhNS00Mzc0LWJhM2EtZmQ5MGI3NjE1MjFjXkEyXkFqcGdeQUlNRGJWaWRlb1RodW1ibmFpbFNlcnZpY2U@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNmViNzkzNjUtNDNhNS00Mzc0LWJhM2EtZmQ5MGI3NjE1MjFjXkEyXkFqcGdeQUlNRGJWaWRlb1RodW1ibmFpbFNlcnZpY2U@._V1_.jpg","description":""</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Avengers Grimm
Mścicielki Grimmów
Avengers Grimm
programme.desc:
Avengers Grimm: Directed by Jeremy M. Inman. With Casper Van Dien, Lauren Parkinson, Lou Ferrigno, Milynn Sarley. When Rumpelstiltskin destroys the Magic Mirror and escapes to the modern world, the four princesses of "Once Upon a Time"-Cinderella, Sleeping Beauty, Snow White, and Rapunzel-are sucked through the portal too. Well-trained and endowed with magical powers, the four women must fight Rumpelstiltskin and his army of thralls before he enslaves everyone on Earth." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt4296026/","name":"Avengers Grimm","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTg5NDEzNDIyOV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwODY3ODA5MzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"When Rumpelstiltskin destroys the Magic Mirror and escapes to the modern world, the four princesses of "Once Upon a Time"-Cinderella, Sleeping Beauty, Snow White, and Rapunzel-are sucked through the portal too. Well-trained and endow","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt4296026/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"claudio_carvalho"},"dateCreated":"2015-07-25","inLanguage":"English","name":"Great Premise Wasted by Lack of Talent","reviewBody":"When Rumpelstiltskin (Casper Van Dien) kills the king of Once Upon a Time kingdom, he proposes Snow White (Lauren Parkinson) to open the portal through the Magic Mirror to the real world; otherwise he would kill her. Snow White does not accept the deal and tries to kill him, but they are sucked by the mirror and vanish. The princesses Cinderella (Milynn Sarley), Sleeping Beauty (Marah Fairclough) and Rapunzel (Rileah Vanderbilt) ask to the Magic Mirror where Snow White is; however, The Wolf (Kimo Leopoldo) has captured Red (Elizabeth Peterson ) and throws her through the Magic Mirror that breaks, sucking her, The Wolf and the princesses to the modern world. Red chases The Wolf through Los Angeles with a piece of the mirror pierced in her shoulder while Snow White rescues the princesses in a car. Soon they learn that Snow White and Rumpelstiltskin arrived a long time ago and Rumpelstiltskin is now the major of Los Angeles. Further, their only chance to return to Once Upon the Time is retrieving the piece of the mirror from Red. But first they need to destroy Rumpelstiltskin and his army. 

"Avengers Grimm" is a fantasy adventure with a great premise wasted by the lack of talent. The acting of the heroins is terrible highlighting Snow White and the blonde Sleeping Beauty; the screenplay and lines are ridiculous; the special effects are poor; and the fighting choreography and battle scenes are incredibly awful. Lou "Hulk" Ferrigno has a minor participation and it is always good to see this actor. It is very funny to see the blonde Sleeping Beauty breaking the piece of glass that would be their only chance to return to their world and her reaction. My vote is three.

Title (Brazil): "Avengers Grimm"","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":3}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":2376,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":2.7},"contentRating":"Not Rated","genre":["Action","Adventure","Fantasy"],"datePublished":"2015-04-14","keywords":"superhero,marvel comics,camp,alternate dimension,fairy tale","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000680/","name":"Casper Van Dien"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3034692/","name":"Lauren Parkinson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0002073/","name":"Lou Ferrigno"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2877888/","name":"Jeremy M. Inman"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0042909/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2877888/","name":"Jeremy M. Inman"}],"duration":"PT1H26M"}</script><metacontent="

When Rumpelstiltskin destroys the Magic Mirror and escapes to the modern world, the four princesses of "Once Upon a Time"-Cinderella, Sleeping Beauty, Snow White, and Rapunzel-are sucked through the portal too. Well-trained and endowed with magical powers, the four women must fight Rumpelstiltskin and his army of thralls before he enslaves everyone on Earth." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt4296026/","name":"Avengers Grimm","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTg5NDEzNDIyOV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwODY3ODA5MzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"When Rumpelstiltskin destroys the Magic Mirror and escapes to the modern world, the four princesses of "Once Upon a Time"-Cinderella, Sleeping Beauty, Snow White, and Rapunzel-are sucked through the portal too. Well-trained and endow","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt4296026/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"claudio_carvalho","dateCreated":"2015-07-25","inLanguage":"English","name":"Great Premise Wasted by Lack of Talent","reviewBody":"When Rumpelstiltskin (Casper Van Dien) kills the king of Once Upon a Time kingdom, he proposes Snow White (Lauren Parkinson) to open the portal through the Magic Mirror to the real world; otherwise he would kill her. Snow White does not accept the deal and tries to kill him, but they are sucked by the mirror and vanish. The princesses Cinderella (Milynn Sarley), Sleeping Beauty (Marah Fairclough) and Rapunzel (Rileah Vanderbilt) ask to the Magic Mirror where Snow White is; however, The Wolf (Kimo Leopoldo) has captured Red (Elizabeth Peterson ) and throws her through the Magic Mirror that breaks, sucking her, The Wolf and the princesses to the modern world. Red chases The Wolf through Los Angeles with a piece of the mirror pierced in her shoulder while Snow White rescues the princesses in a car. Soon they learn that Snow White and Rumpelstiltskin arrived a long time ago and Rumpelstiltskin is now the major of Los Angeles. Further, their only chance to return to Once Upon the Time is retrieving the piece of the mirror from Red. But first they need to destroy Rumpelstiltskin and his army. 

"Avengers Grimm" is a fantasy adventure with a great premise wasted by the lack of talent. The acting of the heroins is terrible highlighting Snow White and the blonde Sleeping Beauty; the screenplay and lines are ridiculous; the special effects are poor; and the fighting choreography and battle scenes are incredibly awful. Lou "Hulk" Ferrigno has a minor participation and it is always good to see this actor. It is very funny to see the blonde Sleeping Beauty breaking the piece of glass that would be their only chance to return to their world and her reaction. My vote is three.

Title (Brazil): "Avengers Grimm"","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":3,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":2376,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":2.7,"contentRating":"Not Rated","genre":["Action","Adventure","Fantasy"],"datePublished":"2015-04-14","keywords":"superhero,marvel comics,camp,alternate dimension,fairy tale","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000680/","name":"Casper Van Dien","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3034692/","name":"Lauren Parkinson","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0002073/","name":"Lou Ferrigno"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2877888/","name":"Jeremy M. programme.title: Monster Island
Monster Island
programme.desc:
Monster Island: Directed by Mark Atkins. With Eric Roberts, Toshi Toda, Adrian Bouchet, Natalie Robbie. Gigantic monsters threaten to destroy everything in their path as mankind remains defenseless." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt10238788/","name":"Monster Island","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNWJhMDA4YWYtNmY4Ni00ZjMwLTllNzQtNjM2ZDlmOWYyODBkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTc2ODExOTk@._V1_.jpg","description":"Gigantic monsters threaten to destroy everything in their path as mankind remains defenseless.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt10238788/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"TheLittleSongbird"},"dateCreated":"2019-07-07","inLanguage":"English","name":"Monsters versus mankind","reviewBody":"The Asylum have the odd watchable effort, but never has their best work really been more than that. Most of the time though, their output is rarely above mediocre and even often terrible, the worst without any redeeming qualities. Yet there is something compulsive about their relatively consistent badness, speaking as somebody who does not actually mind low-budget and can get enjoyment out of this kind of story, as long as some kind of effort is obvious.

'Monster Island', starting off on a kind note or at least an attempt an honest attempt of a kind note if it doesn't come over that year, is not one of The Asylum's worst. Nowhere near, although there is hardly anything good in 'Monster Island' to me (did have to look hard for them too) it isn't completely irredeemable like their worst efforts are. This is from personal perspective of course. Still found it monstrously bad, the flaws are many, almost every other way, and they are not small, huge actually. Saying this with regret not malice, and there is much more to the problem than being derivative.

Its least bad asset is the production design, the one asset where effort was obvious. Though this is only marginally so rather than significantly so. A particularly good job was done with the caves as has been said already. Some of the photography was okay.

Elsewhere, the production values were really poorly done and that the film was made on the cheap is obvious. It looks pretty drab, but it's the disorganised looking editing and last minute looking visual effects, that would even look out of date in the 50s, that come off worst. The submarine is used poorly and there is nothing authentic about it, it didn't look like a submarine and looked like it was filmed in a tank. What can be remembered of the music has very little presence and the film might as better well not had music at all because it didn't fit, added nothing and wouldn't have sounded appealing on its own.

Was expecting little from the script, and it turned out to be worse than expected with the cheese and awkwardness too frequently being rather hard to take. Predictability was hardly unexpected and would have tolerated it, providing that there was some degree of fun and suspense. Unfortunately, 'Monster Island' completely failed to be fun, even on a guilty pleasure level, and the stupidity became intelligence-insulting and exhausting after a while. The suspense was also absent and the whole film felt dreary. The monster action is limited, or at least what the underused creatures are given to do. What there was leaves one confused, bored and shouting at the screen in frustration and the creatures have little personality let alone menace or soul.

Got the sense that the director Mark Atkins had little plan of how to direct or structure 'Monster Island' or what to do with it or that his heart was barely in it. The characters were neither interesting or worth rooting for, there is so little to them in personality or development, their nonsensical decision making is both frustrating and disreacting and how they're written has been seen before many times. The acting is poor at best, the biggest name being Eric Roberts who acts like a sleepwalking robot.

Concluding, very bad. 2/10","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":2}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":582,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":2.6},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Action","Adventure","Sci-Fi"],"datePublished":"2019-06-01","keywords":"sea monster,helicopter,submarine,psychotronic film,underwater scene","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3779051289","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDE2MGVhZTktZGEwYy00NWEyLTg4MjgtYThkMDk2NzQ0N2Q5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDE2MGVhZTktZGEwYy00NWEyLTg4MjgtYThkMDk2NzQ0N2Q5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":""},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000616/","name":"Eric Roberts"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0865084/","name":"Toshi Toda"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1345685/","name":"Adrian Bouchet"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0040630/","name":"Mark Atkins"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0042909/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0040630/","name":"Mark Atkins"}],"duration":"PT1H29M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Enterprise
Star Trek: Enterprise
programme.desc: Enterprise: Created by Rick Berman, Brannon Braga. With Scott Bakula, John Billingsley, Jolene Blalock, Dominic Keating. A century before Captain Kirk's five-year mission, Jonathan Archer captains the United Earth ship Enterprise during the early years of Starfleet, leading up to the Earth-Romulan War and the formation of the Federation." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0244365/","name":"Enterprise","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODg3ZmFmMzAtMTY0Yi00ZDdmLTk1MWMtOThjNjJjODlhMzkwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTE1NjY5Mg@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A century before Captain Kirk's five-year mission, Jonathan Archer captains the United Earth ship Enterprise during the early years of Starfleet, leading up to the Earth-Romulan War and the formation of the Federation.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0244365/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"LtTroy"},"dateCreated":"2005-05-03","inLanguage":"English","name":"A Mixed Series","reviewBody":"I have mixed feelings about this show. It probably has contained some of the best and definitely a lot of the worst Trek episodes ever. It was meant to re-invent Trek but all it did was re-use old plot devices. The best thing they ever did was replace Berman, because he had been working on the franchise too long. Trek needs new blood, and for the 4th season they finally got it. But of course it came too late and now the show has been cancelled after it just started to find its footing.\n\nContrary to some other comments I've seen, Enterprise did NOT use its cast to its fullest potential. Mayweather has been virtually ignored since the first and second seasons (he wasn't even in most of the 3rd season episodes) and when he has been around lately it has only been to lift heavy things or hit something. Reed was just starting to get some good stuff this season. Enterprise had a wonderful opportunity to connect every Trek series together and revitalize the franchise but all it did (and most people believe this) was bury it. Despite Enterprise's accomplishments, its failures reign supreme. As much as I love Trek, it needs a rest. Maybe after a few years it will be brought back by people who have new ideas to bring to it. Then, hopefully, we will truly go where no one has gone before."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":48722,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.5},"contentRating":"TV-PG","genre":["Action","Adventure","Drama"],"datePublished":"2001-09-26","keywords":"earth starship,earthling,terran,space explorer,earthman","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000836/","name":"Scott Bakula"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0082517/","name":"John Billingsley"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0086883/","name":"Jolene Blalock"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0094909/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0066107/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0053559/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0075834/","name":"Rick Berman"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0103804/","name":"Brannon Braga"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Season 1 Blu-Ray Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2275393049","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNmViNzkzNjUtNDNhNS00Mzc0LWJhM2EtZmQ5MGI3NjE1MjFjXkEyXkFqcGdeQUlNRGJWaWRlb1RodW1ibmFpbFNlcnZpY2U@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNmViNzkzNjUtNDNhNS00Mzc0LWJhM2EtZmQ5MGI3NjE1MjFjXkEyXkFqcGdeQUlNRGJWaWRlb1RodW1ibmFpbFNlcnZpY2U@._V1_.jpg","description":""}}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Ultraviolet
programme.desc: Völlig unerwartet ziehen sich die Cylonen zurück, sodaß Starbuck und ihre Leute die Widerstandskämpfer von Caprica retten können.

programme.title: Crank 2: High Voltage
programme.desc: Der Rückzug der Zylonen war nur von kurzer Dauer: Seit vier Monaten haben die einst von Menschen erschaffenen Androiden die Kolonie Neu Caprica besetzt. Unterdrückt von Präsident Baltar und seiner Polizeitruppe, haben die Bewohner nur noch zwei Hoffnungen: ihre Widerstandsbewegung und die Rückkehr von Admiral Adama und seiner Flotte.

programme.title: Léon - Der Profi
programme.desc: Der Rückzug der Zylonen war nur von kurzer Dauer: Seit vier Monaten haben die einst von Menschen erschaffenen Androiden die Kolonie Neu Caprica besetzt. Unterdrückt von Präsident Baltar und seiner Polizeitruppe, haben die Bewohner nur noch zwei Hoffnungen: ihre Widerstandsbewegung und die Rückkehr von Admiral Adama und seiner Flotte.

programme.title: Ultraviolet
programme.desc: Ein Polizist in Salt Lake City ist zunächst begeistert, als er für die Nachtwache im prestigeträchtigen Capitol-Theater eingeteilt wird. Doch dann müssen seine Partner und er Nacht für Nacht untersuchen, was es mit zuschlagenden Türen, Brandgeruch und anderen sonderbaren Vorkommnissen in dem angeblich leeren Gebäude auf sich hat.

programme.title: District 9
programme.desc: Wynonna Earp, Nachfahrin des berüchtigten Revolverhelden Wyatt Earp, kehrt am Abend ihres 27. Geburtstags in ihre Heimatstadt Purgatory zurück, um sich dem Fluch ihrer Familie zu stellen.

programme.desc: Pitbull. Niebezpieczne kobiety: Directed by Patryk Vega. With Alicja Bachleda, Magdalena Cielecka, Anna Dereszowska, Sebastian Fabijanski. Two female police officers fight to survive a police force filled with corrupt superiors and the brutal criminal mafia." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt6212346/","name":"Pitbull. Niebezpieczne kobiety","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYzcwODNiOTQtMmY4OC00YmIzLWJiOWQtN2Y1ZjRlZDgwMTRiL2ltYWdlL2ltYWdlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNDk0NTM4NDg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Two female police officers fight to survive a police force filled with corrupt superiors and the brutal criminal mafia.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt6212346/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"reinprn-29703"},"dateCreated":"2020-06-22","inLanguage":"English","name":"Good one.","reviewBody":"First of all i wanna say is that movie will give you some thoughts, thats guaranteed. There is a timeline or timeshifts two years back and two forth that will confuse you (saying: wth is happening?), and some very realistic and graphic scenes that will haunt you for days. why, i cant explain. I love idea to brighten everybody about the nature of criminal gangers cruelty and police corruption, and making sense about human overall. Thats pretty well displayed. Actors are really good, make you feel like you are seeing live shooting, what i havent seen really long time in a movie. But the bigger thing was that i didnt understand that in directors eyes was this violence and corruption a problem or did he agreed with it. Or this is just currenrt situation. In the scale of: left me too many questions vs too many answers i give 8/10. There is nothing funny in this movie. Really sad and realistic.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":2183,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.6},"genre":["Action","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2016-11-11","keywords":"bare chested male,hairy chest,muscular man,mohawk,vito russo test failed","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0045461/","name":"Alicja Bachleda"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0162123/","name":"Magdalena Cielecka"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1472487/","name":"Anna Dereszowska"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1899656/","name":"Patryk Vega"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1899656/","name":"Patryk Vega"}],"duration":"PT2H15M"}</script><metacontent="
